TopicTitle: Can't see my profile pic, can anyone else see it?

Articles.Content: I've just uploaded a new profile pic and i can't see it. Can anyone see it? If no, is there anyway i could fix it?
If you meant what's next to each of your posts, you want to change your avatar. Your profile pic would be what we see when we go on your profile. And yes it does work.
I think you need some minimum number of posts before it becomes visible.
Can someone send me a screenshot of where the change profile picture button is. I can't find it for the life of me.........

I don't have a pic, but if you click "Settings" in the top right of the forums you'll be taken to the settings page.

On there, look at the left side for a box called "My Settings", it's the 3rd one down.

The option you want is called "Edit Avatar"

Can someone send me a screenshot of where the change profile picture button is. I can't find it for the life of me.........

Click "Settings" in the upper right corner of the forum, then this menu on the left:

I've highlighted the avatar option, the profile picture is right above it.
